title: WTB: Old Judge Player's League Cards
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: WTB: Old Judge Player's League Cards
posts.post_content:
Please email with scans and prices to [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url]

Thanks--Jay
I know they are scarce, but there must be some out there.
Think there's a guy in California, who used to live in Connecticut that's hoarding them.....
I have three PL cards of the same pose. Is that a record?

[quote name="autograf" post=1596363]Think there's a guy in California, who used to live in Connecticut that's hoarding them.....[/QUOTE]

Now that's funny! :D

LOL, I know that guy has no duplicates so it can't be hoarding. 
John, you might be the only guy on the world with a PL duplicate.
Three Farrars with PL in picture. Got them all for less than $400 total because the PL is hard to see in the photo to the right of his left foot. Once I found the one, I kept an eye out for others.
Wow John, didn't realize you had picked up a third.  You've cornered the market on Corcoran and Farrar PL cards.
